comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 (CK-IBM) Firefox/3.6.13 ( .NET CLR 3.5.30729)
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203

Can't switch focus in DownloadManager with Tab key after a download progress is paused or stopped with space/enter key

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Download a large file in firefox
2. Switch focus to pause button with Tab key in the opened download manager dialog
3. Hit Space or Enter key to pause the download

Actual Results:  
Then user can not use TAB to switch the focus within the dialog anymore

Expected Results:  
Focus ring displayed on Download Manager when navigating with Tab key
